caef0ea5-94f5-42e1-86df-0f6f9a564790.summary: Rose quartz, often referred to as the Heart Stone symbolizes unconditional love and infinite peace, fostering deep inner healing and self-love.

aaf9c332-6d5c-4127-9e42-38a0c6adc1f5.summary: Aventurine is known as the Stone of Opportunity believed to be the luckiest of all crystals, especially in manifesting prosperity and wealth.

168ed65a-46ea-4515-96b6-91dabd9c4bb9.summary: The meaning of Amethyst is spiritual healing, calmness, and wisdom. Known as the All Purpose Stone, Amethyst is a protective stone that helps to relieve stress and anxiety in your life.
